thread.title: Netty and Jim Williams
thread.title_full: Cook Travel reviewed by Netty and Jim Williams

author: Netty and Jim Williams
title: Netty and Jim Williams
text: Great service! Beata was our Cook Travel agent. A true professional! Always prompt; kept us informed every step of the way. No problem adjusting to any change or option we requested - dates, itinerary, route, seats - you name it. We have done trips to Europe with her the last two years.
